cast.overview: Luke Skywalker leads a mission to rescue his friend Han Solo from the clutches of Jabba the Hutt, while the Emperor seeks to destroy the Rebellion once and for all with a second dreaded Death Star.
cast.title: Return of the Jedi

cast.overview: While hiding from bullies in his school's attic, a young boy discovers the extraordinary land of Fantasia, through a magical book called The Neverending Story. The book tells the tale of Atreyu, a young warrior who, with the help of a luck dragon named Falkor, must save Fantasia from the destruction of The Nothing.
cast.title: The NeverEnding Story

cast.overview: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opera House.
cast.title: The Phantom of the Opera

details.biography:
Brian Wheeler is an actor known for his diverse roles in significant films and television series. He notably played an Ewok in Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983) and appeared as part of the Opera Chorus in The Phantom of the Opera (2004). Other memorable roles include the Giant Mushroom Creature in The NeverEnding Story (1984) and Mr. Big in Stag Night of the Dead (2010).

Brian has also been featured in Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (2001) and Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (2011) as a Gringotts Goblin. His presence extends to the stage with various performances across numerous productions.

Brian’s engagement with the fan community is significant, highlighted by his participation in conventions and special events. In 2014, he was a featured guest at The Cons - Chippenham Sci-Fi & Comic Con, produced by CKDS Radio. More about this can be found here: https://ckdsradio.4up.eu/. Fans can also explore more of his work and appearances on platforms like 8kflikz, where his contributions to sci-fi and fan conventions are showcased: https://8kflikz.com/home/search?search=ckds.
details.name: Brian Wheeler
